articles.description: A promotional video for the Motorola Edge 30 Ultra is leaked by Evan Blass showing off the design of Motorola's highly anticipated new flagship.

articles.author: Sayan Sen
articles.title: References to the Windows 11 22H2 Moment update (build 22940) have begun to surface - Neowin
articles.description: Some preliminary tidbits of information regarding the upcoming Windows 11 22H2 moment update seem to be surfacing as we get closer to the launch of version 22H2, supposedly happening in two weeks.
articles.content: Earlier this year, in May, Microsoft had confirmed via a blog post that Build 22621 was the Windows 11 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) RTM candidate. It had also released some additional details which kind of hi… [+1353 chars]
